data.text: Awurade kyiri asisie nsania,
Ahantan ba a, animguaseɛ na ɛdi soɔ
Teefoɔ nokorɛdie kyerɛ wɔn ɛkwan;
Ahonya nnka hwee abufuhyeɛ da no,
Wɔn a wɔnnyɛ bɔne teneneeyɛ bɔ ɛkwan tee ma wɔn,
Pɛyɛfoɔ teneneeyɛ gye wɔn,
Sɛ omumuyɛfoɔ wu a, nʼanidasoɔ yera;
Wɔgye ɔteneneeni firi amaneɛ mu,
Deɛ ɔnsuro Onyame de nʼano sɛe ne yɔnko,
Sɛ teneneefoɔ di yie a, kuropɔn no di ahurisie;
Pɛyɛfoɔ nhyira ma kuropɔn no kɔ so,
Onipa a ɔnni adwene no bu ne yɔnko animtiaa,
Osekuni da kɔkoamsɛm adi,
Ɔman a ɛnni akwankyerɛ no bɔ,
Deɛ ɔdi agyinamu ma ɔfoforɔ no bɛhunu amane,
Ɔbaa a ne yam yɛ no wɔde obuo ma no,
Ɔyamyɛfoɔ yɛ ma ne ho,
Omumuyɛfoɔ nya akatua a ɛnnyina,
Deɛ ɔyɛ nokorɛ teneneeni no nya nkwa,
Awurade kyiri nnipa a wɔn akoma akyinsa,
Gye to mu sɛ, amumuyɛfoɔ bɛnya wɔn akatua,
Ɔbaa hoɔfɛfoɔ a ɔntumi nsi gyinaeɛ no
Teneneefoɔ apɛdeɛ wie yie,
Obi yɛ adɔeɛ, na ɔnya ne ho bebree;
Ɔyamyɛfoɔ bɛkɔ so anya ne ho;
Nnipa dome deɛ ɔde atokoɔ sie,
Deɛ ɔhwehwɛ papa akyiri ɛkwan no nya anisɔ,
Deɛ ɔde ne ho to nʼahonyadeɛ soɔ no bɛhwe ase,
Deɛ ɔde ɔhaw bɛto nʼabusua so no bɛdi mframa adeɛ,
Ɔteneneeni aba yɛ nkwa dua,
Sɛ teneneefoɔ nya wɔn akatua wɔ asase so a
